metadata.name: buru$era (reveal in 69 hrs)
metadata.description: Borrowed from Japanese ブルセラ (burusera), from a combination of ブルマー (burumā, “bloomers”) + セーラー服 (sērā-fuku, “sailor suit”), from English bloomers and sailor respectively.(sex) Girls' used underwear and/or school uniforms, which are bought and sold FOR  SEXUAL FETISHISTS PURPOSE ONLY.
